edu.monash.watch.watches

Class Watch1

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.watch.watches.Watch1

  • public class Watch1
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a generalized watch with an arbitrary number of counters. In a Watch1, a counter represents a time unit (eg seconds, minutes etc). While Watches defined using the base class constructor counters will reset to 0 upon reaching their maximum value and increment the next significant value upon reset, this behaviour is dependent on the Counters themselves and may not hold in derived classes.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Robert Merkel
